message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item to you for $145. I believe it's a fair price considering its value. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I was hoping to stay within my budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $130?

Hi Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm looking to get closer to $140 for this item. It's really high quality and I'm confident you'll find it worth the price. How about we meet in the middle at $135?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the quality of the product, but I'm still hoping to keep it under $130. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $125?
